About me

I am a self-taught software engineer based in South Florida. Before making the transition into tech, I was a practicing structural engineer. When I found myself building apps more than designing buildings, I knew it was time for a career change. It was a risk, but my engineering background and passion for the field, gives me the foundation needed in order to become a great developer.

In my free time I love to cook, go to concerts, draw and travel.

Projects

Drinks on Me

Built an app using an API where a user can search drinks. The results displays the ingredients, measurements and directions on how to make the drink the user searched.

Created a game where the player has to "eat" as many dots as they can before the time runs out.
